title: Jeremy Powers Washington DC Cyclocross Camp
description:
Join Fulcrum Coaching, In The Crosshairs and DCMTB for a one of a kind cyclocross experience: A two-day Washington DC cyclocross camp with three-time and current US National Cyclocross Champion Jeremy Powers. The camp includes two full days of instruction by professional cycling coaches and Jeremy. 

Cross Camp takes place Saturday and Sunday, August 8 and 9, at the Armed Force Retirement Home, in Washington DC. The clinic runs from 9am to 4pm. 

Cyclocross racing not only requires you to be in great physical shape but also relies on a unique skill set.  Learning and mastering these skills will make you a better racer this cyclocross season.
On Saturday attendees will learn: 

•	Dismounting
•	Remounting
•	Carrying/Shouldering
•	Off-Cambers
•	Cornering
•	Starts
•	Clipping in quickly
•	Exchanging bikes
•	Bunny hopping: when, why, and how
•	Technique filming

On Sunday we will be put the skills learned on Saturday to use on the UCI DCCX race course. Sunday will include:

•	Individual video review of technique 
•	The anatomy of a race course
•	Equipment and tire selection
•	Small group session race course evaluation
•	30 minute practice race

On site mechanical support will be provided by Bike Doctor of Waldorf. The course and grounds will be professionally groomed for the clinic. 

Four coaches, in addition to Jeremy, will be in attendance to ensure each attendee gets plenty of individual instruction.

The Friday night cross talk is open to the public and costs $15 per person (included in camp fee). Please register!  Space is limited to 50 people!

The Sunday clinic closes with a question and answer period in which prizes are awarded for various accomplishments achieved during the weekend.
course: The camp will be held on the grounds of the Armed Forces Retirement Home in Washington DC. The UCI DCCX course will be used to teach skills and for practice races.
registration: Registration will be available on BikeReg.com.
directions: Directions: The Armed Forces Retirement Home is located at Rock Creek Church Rd, NW & Upshur St, NW, Washington, DC 20011. North of DC: I-95 S to I-495 W. Exit 31 (Georgia Ave) towards Silver Spring. Pass Walter Reed Army Medical Center. Turn left on Upshur St (just after 4200 block of Georgia Ave). Turn right on Rock Creek Church Rd, and then left into AFRH at the Randolph St. gate. South of DC: I-95 N to I-395, stay on to end at New York Ave. Right on New York Ave. Go two blocks and turn right onto M St. Left at second light onto N. Capitol St. NW. Continue past the sign to the Armed Forces Retirement Home. Left onto Allison St. Left onto Rock Creek Church Rd, and left into the Randolph St. gate.
